name: Add/update Mailchimp subscribers from new UpViral contacts
description:
This template periodically checks for new contacts in UpViral and uses the retrieved information to create new subscribers or update existing ones in Mailchimp.

The template expects your MailChimp list to have at least the following fields:
1) Email
2) First Name

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
